item.title: ESTABLISHING TRUST IN INDEED USERS
item.description: To identify design and architectural elements that create or withhold the feeling of trust of a user towards indeed.com

item.title: Browse With Me
item.description: An online clothes shopping assistant for people with visual impairments with support for voice recognition and AI based automated image description generation.

item.title: Gardenio App
item.description: Design a mobile app which empowers users to learn more about food growing, creates a community and a thriving marketplace all in one.
